text: Hey everyone! Happy Friday. I dropped an episode I had with <@U01JENL8V63> at Alyce. We talked about the importance of writing, marketing to your customer's customer, and thinking outside of the box. Love what Alyce is doing with personalization. You should check out their stuff. Enjoyed this conversation. Hope you do too. :sunglasses::headphones::beverage_box: <https://www.thejuicehq.com/blog/new-3c-podcast-episode-trashing-the-one-size-fits-all-approach-to-b2b-marketing-with-sara-pion-alyce>

attachments.title: New 3C Podcast Episode: Trashing the One Size Fits All Approach to B2B Marketing with Sara Pion of Alyce | The Juice
attachments.text: We are on a mission to provide value to B2B content marketers abound. Rewind the VHS version of your content strategy. Let us help you deliver the Netflix experience.
attachments.fallback: New 3C Podcast Episode: Trashing the One Size Fits All Approach to B2B Marketing with Sara Pion of Alyce | The Juice

elements.text: Hey everyone! Happy Friday. I dropped an episode I had with

at Alyce. We talked about the importance of writing, marketing to your customer's customer, and thinking outside of the box. Love what Alyce is doing with personalization. You should check out their stuff. Enjoyed this conversation. Hope you do too.

text:
Hello, everyone! 

We, at Passionbits, are looking for technical writers to work with on project-to-project basis, to fulfil our clients' content needs, who are mainly in the B2B SaaS space.

Passionbits is an exclusive platform for technical writers who are starting off their independent career, or are looking to scale up their solopreneur journey. We are connected with the B2B SaaS SME's in the US, who are willing to work with freelancers, for their website blogs, white papers, e-books etc.

If you're interested, or know someone who would be, this is the empanelment form to be filled-

<https://forms.gle/eZSdon642nKKfjjK9|https://forms.gle/eZSdon642nKKfjjK9>

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Thanks and happy weekend! :innocent:

attachments.title: Google Forms - create and analyze surveys, for free.
attachments.text: Create a new survey on your own or with others at the same time. Choose from a variety of survey types and analyze results in Google Forms. Free from Google.
attachments.fallback: Google Forms - create and analyze surveys, for free.
